items.name: Goldwyrm
explicitMods: 60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
20% increased Quantity of Items found
+47% to Fire Resistance
10% increased Movement Speed
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports mark curse skills.
explicitMods: 16% reduced Effect of Marks from Supported Skills
Trigger Supported Skill when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy with an Attack
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any non-blessing skill. Minions cannot gain the Lifetap buff.

Costs and Effects of a Supported Skill

Lifetap lasts 6 seconds

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 35% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Attack, Minion, Duration, Movement, Travel, Bow

socketedItems.secDescrText: Fires an arrow at the target destination. When the arrow lands, you are teleported to it and a clone is summoned at your old location. The clone is a minion that uses your bow and quiver.
explicitMods: Base duration is 3.00 seconds
47% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Minions deal 57% more Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Bisco's Leash
explicitMods: 5% increased Quantity of Items found
+39% to Cold Resistance
1% increased Rarity of Items found per 15 Rampage Kills
Rampage
flavourText: You were always there, by my side,
whether we sat or played.
Our friendship was a joyful ride,
I wish you could have stayed.

items.name: Ventor's Gamble
explicitMods: +32 to maximum Life
9% increased Quantity of Items found
31% increased Rarity of Items found
+1% to Fire Resistance
+50% to Cold Resistance
+48% to Lightning Resistance
flavourText: In a blaze of glory,
An anomaly defying all odds
The "unkillable" beast met the divine
And Ventor met his latest trophy.

I will see them again, but not until my work is done.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports skills that hit enemies, causing them to gain bonuses while you have resonance of all three elements, and to grant resonance of elements other than the highest one in a hit. There is a maximum of 50 Resonance for each Element. Cannot support triggered skills, instant skills, orb skills, brands, skills with a reservation, or skills used by totems, traps, or mines. Cannot modify the skills of minions.
explicitMods:
Hits with Supported Skills for which the highest Damage Type is Elemental cause you to gain 25 Resonance of other Elements per second for 2 seconds
Lose 5 Resonance per second of each Element you are not gaining
Supported Skills deal 3% more Elemental Damage per 5 of lowest Resonance
Supported Skills penetrate 16% Elemental Resistances while each Resonance is at least 25
Supported Skills deal 10% increased Elemental Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
